Title: Battlefield Record 6010: This Might Be the Last
Text:
WOMAN VOICE: "Mom, it's the forty-seventh day of this battle and I turned twenty-two."
WOMAN VOICE: "Forty-seven days and I've gone from being a big-headed soldier to acting platoon leader."
Female voice: "The enemy kept coming up like cockroaches."
FEMALE VOICE: "And we will not hesitate to stomp on them, as always."
[pauses and takes a deep breath
Female voice: "Mom, I'll be back. They'll bring me back, and remember to leave the windows unlocked."
